args.query: mathlib4 covering_space deck transformation lift path locally path connected locally simply connected topological space CoveringSpace

args.natural_language_statement: For any path connected and locally simply connected topological space X, a homeomorphism g : \tilde{X} → \tilde{X} which preserves the covering map p : \tilde{X} → X (i.e. p ∘ g = p) takes any lift \tilde{γ} of a path γ : I → X to a lift of the same path. In other words, if p ∘ \tilde{γ} = γ then p ∘ (g ∘ \tilde{γ}) = γ. Translate this into Lean4 (import Mathlib at the top) and end the statement with := by sorry (no full proof).

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {X Xtil : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Xtil]
variable {I : Type*} [TopologicalSpace I]

/-- If g : X~ → X~ satisfies p ∘ g = p, then g takes any lift γ̃ of a path γ to a lift of the same path. -/
theorem deck_transformation_preserves_lifts
  (p : Xtil → X) (g : Xtil → Xtil)
  (hg : p ∘ g = p)
  {γ : I → X} {γtil : I → Xtil} (hγ : p ∘ γtil = γ) :
  p ∘ (g ∘ γtil) = γ := by sorry
